markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 5+"
    pfs=""
>
[Skeleton Key](/Equipment.aspx?ID=266)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 575 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A grinning skull tops the bow of this macabre key. This key can be used in place of [thieves’ tools](/Equipment.aspx?ID=58) when attempting to Pick a Lock, and it grants a +1 item bonus to the Thievery check. If the _skeleton key_ becomes broken due to a critical failure on the check, it works as normal thieves’ tools and loses its benefits until repaired.

<document level="2" id="action-174" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 5"
pfs="Standard"
>
Skeleton Key
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 575 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 125 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Skeleton Key (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 575 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 1,250 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The key grants a +2 item bonus, and you can activate the key once per hour.
name: Skeleton Key
